full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,ZHING MCHOG YID DGA' CHOS 'DZIN DU SKYE BA'I SMON LAM NOR BU'I THEM SKAS ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @015B (CES DGA' LDAN YID DGA' CHOS 'DZIN DU SKYES PA'I SMON LAM 'DI NI DAD BRTZON BLO LDAN PA DKON MCHOG THAMS MKHAS KYIS BSKUL BA'I NGOR, ^BTZUN PA DKON MCHOG BSTAN PA'I @016A *, ,SGRON MES SKAL MNYAM RNAMS LA PHAN PA'I SLAD DU GO BDE BAR 'BOL RTZOMS SU BGYIS PA 'DIS KYANG SKYE BO RNAMS LA PHAN THOGS PAR GYUR CIG ,ZHING MCHOG DGE'I CHOS KYI PHO BRANG DER, ,SKYES PA'I THABS MCHOG SMON LAM THEM SKAS MA, ,BAR DU BKOD PA'I RNAM DKAR PHUNG PO'I MTHUS, ,RGYU SBYOR BYED PO DPON SLOB 'KHOR BCAS SOGS, ,'BREL THOGS KUN KYANG TSE RABS 'DI NAS BZUNG, BSHES GNYES BYANG BAR CAN GYIS ZIN PA DANG, ,LOG PA'I LAM DU NAN YANG MI LTUNG BAR, ,RGYAL BA DGYES PA'I LAM LA 'JUG PAR SHOG ,)
author_simple: DKON MCHOG BSTAN PA'I SGRON ME,
